Title: Assigning GitHub Copilot to an issue now adds you as an assignee
Author: Allison
EnhancedContent:
When you assign an issue to Copilot, you’ll now automatically be added as an assignee yourself. This makes it easier to track your work using filters like `assignee:@me` and understand who is working on an issue.

## Share your feedback

Join the [community discussion](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/173575) to share your feedback or learn more in [our documentation on assigning issues to Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/how-tos/use-copilot-agents/coding-agent/create-a-pr).
